query:
/*+ NoHashJoin(ci mc t n) NoHashJoin(ci mc n rt t an) */ select min(an.name) AS acress_pseudonym,
min(t.title) AS japanese_anime_movie
from title AS t
inner join movie_companies AS mc
on t.id = mc.movie_id AND t.title like 'The%' AND t.production_year BETWEEN 1978 AND 2000 AND mc.note like '%(Japan)%' AND mc.note not like '%(USA)%' AND ( mc.note like '%(2006)%' OR mc.note like '%(2007)%')
inner join cast_info AS ci
on ci.movie_id = t.id AND ci.movie_id = mc.movie_id AND ci.note = '(based on the novel by)'
inner join name AS n
on n.id = ci.person_id AND n.name like '%Yo%' AND n.name not like '%Yu%'
inner join role_type AS rt
on ci.role_id = rt.id AND rt.role = 'writer'
inner join aka_name AS an
on an.person_id = ci.person_id AND an.person_id = n.id
inner join company_name AS cn
on mc.company_id = cn.id AND cn.country_code = '[jp]';
